channel.title: Plugins on Mattermost Developers
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Mattermost Developers

item.title: Help Wanted Tickets
item.description: Each plugin’s Help Wanted tickets are located in the respective plugin’s GitHub repository. In order to browse all of the open tickets, see this issue in the server repository with links to specific plugin repositories, and queries for Help Wanted tickets in each repository. The “All Plugins Up for Grabs” link there is useful to browse all repositories at once.

item.title: Developer Setup
item.description: Please see the plugin developer setup and developer workflow pages for information on the plugin development environment.
